about_the_game:
If you're a big fan of The Spell Brigade and want something extra, then this Supporter Pack is just the thing for you! Purchasing this DLC greatly supports us and allows us to keep working on the game to make it as good as we can.

As a reward for your support, you will get 8 exclusive sketchy black-and-white concept skins that you can choose to equip, and show the rest of your squad that you are a real one.



Note that buying this DLC is mainly to show your support for the game and the developers. The skins you get are simply a bonus, and a token of appreciation from us to you! You will not need this DLC to complete the game.
